SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, e.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM exercise
ORDER BY e_code DESC ) e
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageSize} * (#{pageNo} - 1) + #{pageSize} ) WHERE rnum >= #{pageSize} * (#{pageNo} - 1) + 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exercise ( e_code, exercise_name, exercise_type, region, gender, weight, cal_burn ) VALUES ( E_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{exerciseName}, #{exerciseType}, #{region, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{calBurn} )

INSERT INTO exercise SELECT e_seq.NEXTVAL AS eCode, DECODE(MOD(LEVEL, 2), 0, '달리기', '벤치프레스') || LEVEL AS exerciseName, DECODE(MOD(LEVEL, 2), 0, '유산소', '근력') AS exerciseType, DECODE(MOD(LEVEL, 2), 0, '가슴', '하체') AS region, '남성' AS gender, 50 AS weight, 100 AS calBurn FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <=502
mapper.update: UPDATE exercise SET exercise_name = #{exerciseName}, exercise_type = #{exerciseType}, region = #{region, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weight = #{weight, jdbcType=INTEGER}, cal_burn = #{calBurn} WHERE e_code = #{eCode}
